document.full_text: credit rating agency s&p has offered a settlement deal in an eu market abuse probe of financial identifier code pricing and data provider thomson reuters  should work to resolve a similar case, the eu said on monday.
document.title: thomson reuters urged to match s&p antitrust offer
lines_and_colors: credit rating agency s&p has offered a settlement deal in an eu market abuse probe of financial identifier code pricing and data provider thomson reuters  should work to resolve a similar case, the eu said on monday.
